location_working: 24/7, only under the supervision of responsible adults
location_description: Younger guests love to play outdoors. There is a sandbox for them, swings, a house with ladders, a slide, a swing and a mesh for climbing, an air swing, a boat for riding with friends, a revolving swing, a carousel, balance-beams, athletic wall unit, volcano mesh for climbing, a fairy ship for lovers of active games and sea adventures.
